name: The Static
description:
we're not sure what the purpose of this is - if there needs to be a purpose. the image manifested itself and yearned for a husk, something to contain it and give it closure, but all we hear now is the static.
if there was an ending, we couldn't see its shape through the noise - but who is to tell if there ever was one.

---

The Static

made by Pol Clarissou
using Tim Exile's S L O W for audio editing 
this is a walking sim and there is no goal

---

The low-rez version of this game can be played online (webGL) here.

Downloads for the full-rez and low-rez standalone builds below. 
(There are slight differences between the webGL and low-rez standalone versions due to platform quirks)

---

light sensitivity warning: this game contains occasional flashes of bright light
